name: max-ether
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores PP to full for a selected move.
short_effect: Restores PP to full for one move.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: It fully restores the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.
flavor_text.platinum: It fully restores the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It fully restores the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.
